emissary.roll.Rollable

  • Packages that use Rollable 
    Package Description
    emissary.metrics  
    emissary.output.roller
    Provides classes that is related to the Emissary Rollable framework
    emissary.roll
    Rollable framework for handling actions on various intervals
    emissary.util.roll
    Utilities for the Emissary Rolling framework

      class  AgentsEmitter
      This class is used to write out agents status via a logger.

    • Uses of Rollable in emissary.output.roller

      Subinterfaces of Rollable in emissary.output.roller 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  IJournaler
      A Rollable implementation that uses a journal to record offsets of completed writes to a pool of outputs.
      Classes in emissary.output.roller that implement Rollable 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  JournaledCoalescer
      The Rollable implemenation that uses a journal to record offsets of completed writes to a pool of outputs.
